name: Double M: MURDER MARCO
description:
This game is thought to be a relection about greed and empathy. The players will get a chance to consider their decision and follow the path of greed and selfishness or cooperative and passive.

The Design is meant to be simple and minimaistic with a lot of room for the Game Master to costumize the ahmosphere so the game will have different endings every time, even when every action has a clear cause and consequence. This way people will not have an advantage or disadvantage because of their math or language skills. It is a matter of luck and strategy 

The rules and system d not come from any other SRD, they are completely original ideas that came from nothing.
